description: Number of distinct 4th powers mod n.
comments: This sequence is multiplicative. - Leon P Smith, Apr 16 2005
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
maple: A052273 := proc(n,k) local i; nops({seq(i^k mod n,i=0..n-1)}); end; # number of k-th powers mod n
prog: (PARI) a(n)=my(f=factor(n)); prod(i=1,#f[,1],my(k=f[i,1]^f[i,2]); #vecsort(vector(k,i,i^4%k),,8)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 26 2013
crossrefs: Cf. A000224 (squares), A046530 (cubic residues), A052274 (5th powers), A052275 (6th powers), A085310 (7th powers), A085311 (8th powers), A085312 (9th powers), A085313 (10th powers), A085314 (11th powers), A228849 (12th powers).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 05 2000
